titleStmt.title: The Humble representation and vindication of many of the messengers, elders, and brethren belonging to several of the baptized churches in this nation of and concerning their opinions and resolutions touching the civil government of these nations and of their deportment under the same : together with a cautionary word from two of the messengers to their brethren to bespeak their peaceable subjection to the present government.

The Humble representation and vindication of many of the messengers, elders, and brethren belonging to several of the baptized churches in this nation of and concerning their opinions and resolutions touching the civil government of these nations and of their deportment under the same : together with a cautionary word from two of the messengers to their brethren to bespeak their peaceable subjection to the present government.

notesStmt.note: Petition signed: S. Fisher [et al] ; cautionary signed: S. Fisher and J.S.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
